title: Marc_IRL:推荐一款大型天域地图
author: 酱瓜
txt_content:
Now this is what I'm talking about. Music, voice, educational value, adventure... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6CtBBLtQVo … Get it at http://bit.ly/Yggdrasil_Map @Marc_IRL：这是我一直所钟爱的~音乐、教育、冒险……
